alert.note: Alert for Northern Craven (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 03 at 2:55AM EST by NWS Newport/Morehead City
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Jones, central Craven and west central Pamlico Counties through 330 AM EST... At 254 AM EST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Phillips Crossroads, or 15 miles north of Half Moon, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... New Bern, Trent Woods, River Bend, Askins, Jasper, Tuscarora, Rhems, Olympia, Ernul, Coastal Carolina Regional Airport, Bridgeton, Pollocksville and Trenton. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
